messages.subject: Live & Learn
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to all who made the Live & Learn conference happen last week. It was our first and we had a blast! My dd, Corrina, made lots of new friends and is
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to all who made the Live & Learn conference happen last week.
It was our first and we had a blast!

My dd, Corrina, made lots of new friends and is missing them! If any
of your kids met her and would like to IM/email her, please email me
off-list.

Thanks, all!

Tina

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Live & Learn
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/18/2004 9:43:24 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: That is not all who attend though.  I went to the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/18/2004 9:43:24 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
That is not all who attend though. I went to the first one. We had been
unschooling but I knew of no one else who was. I had been searching the web,
and
ran across the SOS sight and thought it sounded like a good place to see more
unschooling in action. Although I had no idea it would be so child friendly.
It was refreshing and that is where I heard about the unschooling dotcom
list and a few months later joined.
Thanks Kelly.<<<<<<


My pleasure!


And this year's tapes (as well as last year's) are now available. I'll be
posting the link, etc. when I have it.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
